text:
*[Bug 18815] New: Replacing cross references to file names by their topics*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18815>

            Bug ID: 18815
           Summary: Replacing cross references to file names by their
                    topics
           Product: R
           Version: R-devel (trunk)
          Hardware: All
                OS: Windows 32-bit
            Status: UNCONFIRMED
          Severity: normal
          Priority: P5
         Component: Documentation
          Assignee: <mailto:R-core@R-project.org|R-core@R-project.org>
          Reporter: <mailto:lluis.revilla@gmail.com|lluis.revilla@gmail.com>

Created attachment 3420
  --> <https://bugs.r-project.org/attachment.cgi?id=3420&action=edit>
Replace cross references to file names to topics

I want to upload a patch for the issue I reported on
<https://stat.ethz.ch/pipermail/r-devel/2024-September/083626.html>

The NEWS from 4.1.0 said: 
> For HTML help (both dynamic and static), Rd file links to help pages in external packages are now treated as references to topics rather than file names, and fall back to a file link only if the topic is not found in the target package.

But there are still 12 cross references that have references to file names
instead of topics.
This patch fixes this.

Replace cross references to file names to topics

I want to upload a patch for the issue I reported on

For HTML help (both dynamic and static), Rd file links to help pages in external packages are now treated as references to topics rather than file names, and fall back to a file link only if the topic is not found in the target package.

But there are still 12 cross references that have references to file names
instead of topics.
This patch fixes this.
